text: Nevin may refer to: ==Surname== * Nevin (surname) ==Given name== *Nevin Çokay (1930–2012), Turkish painter *Nevin Saroya (born 1980), English footballer *Nevin S. Scrimshaw (born 1918), American food scientist *Nevin Spence (1990–2012), Irish rugby player *Nevin Yanıt (born 1986), Turkish sprinter ==Places== *Anglicised name for Nefyn, Welsh town ==See also== *Nevins (disambiguation) *Nevinson Category:Turkish feminine given names
title: Nevin
